text: Tom Ellis is celebrated among the masses for his roles in series like Miranda and Lucifer. While he continues to thrive in his acting career, the focus has now shifted to his personal life. Many wish to find out who is the seasoned actor married to. So, who is Tom Ellis’ wife and what does she do for a living? Here is everything you need to know about Ellis’ spouse, her job, and the couple’s relationship history. Who is Tom Ellis married to? Meaghan Oppenheimer is Tom Ellis’ wife. Prior to Oppenheimer, Ellis was married to Tamzin Outhwaite. But, the duo parted ways in 2013. What is Meaghan Oppenheimer’s job? Meaghan Oppenheimer is a screenwriter and producer who also acted in theater in her childhood. Hailing from Tulsa, Oklahoma, Oppenheimer worked as a child actor in numerous theater productions and shows. She reportedly completed her education at Holland Hall and New York University—Tisch School of the Arts. Oppenheimer later decided to pursue a career in screenwriting and wrote and acted in the 2010 film titled Hot Mess. Her other screenwriting credits include Fear the Walking Dead, We Are Your Friends, Queen, and Tell Me Lies. In Tell Me Lies, Meaghan Oppenheimer also serves as a showrunner and executive producer. Tom Ellis and Meaghan Oppenheimer’s relationship history Tom Ellis crossed paths with Meaghan Oppenheimer in 2014 following his separation from Tamzin Outhwaite. Sparks began to fly and the two began a romantic relationship in 2015. After a couple of years of romance, Oppenheimer announced their engagement in an Instagram post in 2017 where she was seen flaunting her ring. The couple tied the knot on June 1, 2019, in a dreamy ceremony near a lake amidst the presence of their family and friends. In November 2023, their first child together was born through surrogacy, a baby girl whom they named Dolly Ellis-Oppenheimer.

Here is everything you need to know about Ellis’ spouse, her job, and the couple’s relationship history.

Who is Tom Ellis married to?

Meaghan Oppenheimer is Tom Ellis’ wife.

Prior to Oppenheimer, Ellis was married to Tamzin Outhwaite. But, the duo parted ways in 2013.

What is Meaghan Oppenheimer’s job?

Meaghan Oppenheimer is a screenwriter and producer who also acted in theater in her childhood.

Hailing from Tulsa, Oklahoma, Oppenheimer worked as a child actor in numerous theater productions and shows. She reportedly completed her education at Holland Hall and New York University—Tisch School of the Arts. Her other screenwriting credits include Fear the Walking Dead, We Are Your Friends, Queen, and Tell Me Lies. In Tell Me Lies, Meaghan Oppenheimer also serves as a showrunner and executive producer.

Tom Ellis and Meaghan Oppenheimer’s relationship history
